subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The estranged wife of an equipment manager was charged with trying to extort Louisville Coach Rick Pitino. According to a federal complaint, Karen Sypher first demanded cars and tuition for her children, then asked for $10 million, according a federal complaint. She is also accused of lying to the F.B.I. She appeared in court but did not enter a plea and was released on her own recognizance. It was not clear why she was demanding the money. Court documents say only that Pitino said he believed it was related to an encounter in 2003.
